originalText.text: Dr. Copeland-Halperin made for a great experience in removing a lipoma on my forehead. From the consultation to the procedure to the follow up appointments, she was very thorough and made me feel comfortable and confident. She did an amazing job executing the procedure and kept scarring to a minimum. I would definitely recommend her!

text.text: Dr. Copeland-Halperin made for a great experience in removing a lipoma on my forehead. From the consultation to the procedure to the follow up appointments, she was very thorough and made me feel comfortable and confident. She did an amazing job executing the procedure and kept scarring to a minimum. I would definitely recommend her!

originalText.text: What a gem of a doctor!!! I have been seeing Dr. Copeland-Halperin for laser scar revision and have already seen amazing results. Excellent bedside manners, I feel like I can talk to her about anything and she is so good at explaining things in a way that you understand. Her office is beautiful with all of the latest technology. Also everyone on her team is so lovely - Lauren, Andrea, and Susan - they all care so much for you to have a good experience. Would recommend to anyone without hesitation !!!

text.text: What a gem of a doctor!!! I have been seeing Dr. Copeland-Halperin for laser scar revision and have already seen amazing results. Excellent bedside manners, I feel like I can talk to her about anything and she is so good at explaining things in a way that you understand. Her office is beautiful with all of the latest technology. Also everyone on her team is so lovely - Lauren, Andrea, and Susan - they all care so much for you to have a good experience. Would recommend to anyone without hesitation !!!

originalText.text:
In addition to being an outstanding surgeon, Dr. Libby Copeland-Halperin is a caring person with a warm, friendly demeanor. Her staff is efficient, pleasant and accommodating, especially when dealing with insurance, medical supply companies, and home-care nurses.
Three years ago, I had two very difficult open wounds on my ankle which wouldn’t heal despite the efforts of two top specialists. After two years, Dr. Copeland-Halperin was brought in to take on my case. Now, after a year involving surgery, debridements, skin grafts, an external wound device and three times per-week nursing care, I am delighted to say that both wounds are fully healed. My treatment unavoidably involved a good deal of pain and Dr. Copeland-Halperin was empathetic, patient and considerate. Throughout this ordeal she was always accessible, fully invested in my care while thoroughly discussing every step of treatment. I am extremely grateful to Dr. Copeland-Halperin for my positive outcome and enthusiastically recommend her without reservation. Thank you Dr. Copeland-Halperin!

originalText.text: Dr. Libby Copeland is an outstanding Doctor.  She was very attentive regarding all of my medical issues. I would highly recommend her for any type of cosmetic procedure. She is very friendly and goes above and beyond to help her patients.

originalText.text: Dr Copeland-Halperin removed a lipoma from the back of my neck, the result is fantastic. her attention to details and the after care is also amazing. She made sure I was comfortable during the procedure and all my follow ups were scheduled by Andrea who offers excellent customer care. I will be back if I should I ever need any other procedures.Clean environment with state of the art equipment and a helpful team.❤️
